dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1966
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Diary-like chronicle of canning tomatoes, panhandling, use of a missal at Mass, evils of drink, murder of peace activists, a visit to her daughter and grand children, a peacemaker conference, and non-violent work in India.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 843 1966-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
